learning.title: Escalation Protocols and When to Use Them

questions.rationaleMd: Criteria: impact, risk, deadline proximity; prior attempts.

answers.contentMd: High impact risk, deadline near, attempts made; brief prepared with clear ask
answers.feedbackMd: Meets criteria and uses a professional brief.

answers.contentMd: First disagreement on a minor issue

questions.promptMd: What belongs in an escalation brief?

answers.contentMd: Context, issue, impact, attempts, desired decision/ask
answers.feedbackMd: Enables quick triage and fair judgment.
